name: Humongous Entertainment Game Archive
summary: Learn about .HE0 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: HE0 files are archives used by adventure games, such as Putt-Putt, Fatty Bear, Pajama Sam, and Freddi Fish, developed by Humongous Entertainment to store game data. The HE0 file is also used by ScummVM, a reiteration of the SCUMM game engine that lets you play classic games on your current machine.
NOTE: The HE0 resource file is located in the game directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
